short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Japanese word definitions and reading by hovering over words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick way to look up words, kanji, and names.

Features:
• Word bookmarks and practice using flashcards or tests.
• Anki Integration
• Command menu for searching words, kanji, or names. Press the Ctrl+Alt+A keys on any page to open the command menu.
• Dashboard page to see more details about a word, kanji, or name with its stroke order.

If you found a bug or want to request a new feature, open an issue in the Kotobai repository:
https://github.com/Kholid060/kotobai
